headerPrara: Everything you need to sell and market Poynt products to your merchants
productOverview1Para: Small in size, big in flexibility. The Poynt 5 has a sleek footprint, but with all the functionality you would expect from an enterprise-ready payment terminal.
productOverview2Para: The world's first smart terminal continues to amaze. You offer your customers the products and services they love don't forget to let them pay the way they like.
productOverview3Para: Confirm bank transfer, you will receive notification for provided e-mail address. QR code payment is fast and easy-to-use.
viewMoreOneBigCapPara1: All-in-one Android based system with multiple payments support
viewMoreOneBigCapPara2: Our mobile POS is designed specifically to help you run your business better. A dedicated hardware that performs as good as it looks

viewMoreOneEndingBody.name: ANDROID SUPPORT
viewMoreOneEndingBody.para: Secure and customizable Android operating system

viewMoreOneEndingBody.name: WIFI & 4G LTE
viewMoreOneEndingBody.para: Supports 4G LTE and Wi-Fi for fast transaction confirmation

viewMoreOneEndingBody.name: BATTERY
viewMoreOneEndingBody.para: 2000 mAh battery with reserve 150mAh lasts whole day

viewMoreOneEndingBody.name: GPS TRACKING
viewMoreOneEndingBody.para: GPS system for location tracking field agents & staff

viewMoreOneEndingBody.name: CAMERA
viewMoreOneEndingBody.para: 4 core 1.8 Ghz Cortex A15 application processor 108 Mhz Cortex M3 security processor

viewMoreOneEndingBody.name: PROCESSOR
viewMoreOneEndingBody.para: Front and back camera Front Camera: 5MP I autofocus (7cm to in nity) Back camera: VGA
